        protected FieldModifierTransformer(ModifierContributor.Resolver<ModifierContributor.ForField> resolver)
        Creates a new field token modifier for transforming a field's modifiers.
        参数:
        resolver - The resolver to apply for transforming the modifiers of a field.

      • transform

        public FieldDescription.Token transform(TypeDescription instrumentedType,
                                        FieldDescription.Token target)
        从接口复制的说明: Transformer
        Transforms the supplied target.
        指定者:
        transform 在接口中 Transformer<FieldDescription.Token>
        参数:
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type that declares the target being transformed.
        target - The target entity that is being transformed.
        返回:
        The transformed instance.
